key.name: supporttopicdefaultdesc
key.value: To route your request to the appropriate support engineer, choose a support topic. If your support topic is not listed, select Other, and then click Continue to proceed.

key.name: subtopicdefaultdesc
key.value: If your support sub-topic is not listed, select Other, and then click Continue to proceed.

key.name: supporttopichelptext
key.value: Support topics help us to quickly route your request to the support engineer who is best able to address your problem.

key.name: submitcancel
key.value: You will lose all the information that you have entered. Are you sure that you want to cancel?

key.name: missingdesc
key.value: This support topic will help us to route your request to the appropriate support engineer.

key.name: reqdsuptopic
key.value: Please select a support topic that describes the problem. If your support topic is not listed, select Other to proceed.
